gobblin.security.ssl

Class SSLContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.security.ssl.SSLContextFactory

  • public class SSLContextFactory
extends Object
    Provide different approaches to create a SSLContext

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static SSLContext createInstance(File keyStoreFile,
                                        String keyStorePassword,
                                        String keyStoreType,
                                        File trustStoreFile,
                                        String trustStorePassword)
        Create a SSLContext instance
        Parameters:
        keyStoreFile - a p12 or jks file depending on key store type
        keyStorePassword - password to access the key store
        keyStoreType - type of key store
        trustStoreFile - a jks file
        trustStorePassword - password to access the trust store

      • createInstance

        public static SSLContext createInstance(Config srcConfig)
        Create a SSLContext from a Config

        A sample configuration is:
        keyStoreFilePath=/path/to/key/store
        keyStorePassword=password
        keyStoreType=PKCS12
        trustStoreFilePath=/path/to/trust/store
        trustStorePassword=password

        Parameters:
        srcConfig - configuration
        Returns:
        an instance of SSLContext
